thread.section_title: Servicecaster Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Servicecaster | servicecaster.com | 6 of 113
thread.title: Louis

author: Louis
title: Louis
text: I called customer service to ask a question before placing an order. They answered my question so I ordered casters from their website.I placed the order on a Tuesday and the package was delivered on Thursday. Fast service!!! The one issue I had was the sleeves for the casters were a smaller diameter than the holes in the bottom of the chairs. I had to fill the holes with wood filler and redrill all the holes (16 holes) to the correct size. Extra work I had not planned on.
